days.title: PBS's Victory Garden Partnership
days.description: Subaru signs on as a sponsor for the long-running Public Broadcasting Service show, Victory Garden.

days.title: EPA Gold Award for Climate Change
days.description: The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency honors Subaru with the WasteWise Gold Achievement Award for Climate Change.
days.shortdesc: The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency honors Subaru with the WasteWise Gold Achievement Award for Climate Change.
